description:
F R E E D O M
⭐️ the right to live your life as you see fit
⭐️ to feed your family what you choose
⭐️ to approve or reject medical interventions
⭐️ to safeguard your privacy
⭐️ to educate yourself
⭐️ to question the status quo
⭐️ to follow your intuition
⭐️ to do all of the above while respecting others’ rights to do the same

On this Fourth of July, we hope  this freedom will always be yours, wherever you live on this planet. 🌍 

The Weston A. Price Foundation supports & advocates for your right to cultivate your health, to explore alternative healing pathways & real foods.

Listen while you can to Wise Traditions podcast #248 “Proactive amidst this crisis” (link in bio) for more encouragement from Dr. Zach Bush. Because apparently living free is threatening to some. This podcast was censored from YouTube.
